item.title: Short notes on namedtuples, NamedTuples and Data classes
item.description: Both dataclasses and tuples are based on the attrs project, the one Python Library everybody needs and are fast object types (factory methods) designed to simplify and reduce code. namedtuple and NamedTuple Both immutable Tuple-based (hence fast) but far better than tuples NamedTuple is the typed version of namedtuple immutable, iterable, hashable, unpackable backward-compatible with tuple (e.g you can access a namedtuple by index) default arguments supported from Python 3.7+ fast!
